description: A man attempts to exercise on a stationary bike, initially sweating profusely. As he tires, he becomes less engaged, eventually relaxing back on the seat. In a surreal turn, his limbs fuse with the machine's pedals and handlebars via tentacle-like appendages. He is then depicted having fallen off the bike, yet remains physically attached to the apparatus. This sequence satirizes the struggle with exercise, portraying the effort as a consuming and ultimately ensnaring experience where the man is absorbed by the very equipment meant to free him from his sedentary state.
